name: x_org_slug
description: Organization identifier for multi-tenancy (x_ prefix for customer dataset).

name: provider
description: Commitment provider: azure_openai_ptu, aws_bedrock_pt, gcp_vertex_pt.

name: commitment_type
description: Type: ptu (Azure), provisioned_throughput (AWS), gsu (GCP).

name: model
description: Model covered by commitment. Example: gpt-4, claude-3-sonnet.

name: unit_name
description: PTU type identifier to distinguish variants. Example: gpt-4-ptu, gpt-4-32k-ptu, claude-3-sonnet-pt. Issue #48: Required to differentiate pricing tiers within same model family.

name: region
description: Deployment region. Example: eastus, us-east-1, us-central1.

name: ptu_hourly_rate
description: Hourly rate per PTU/unit in USD. Issue #3: BUSINESS RULE - At least one of ptu_hourly_rate or ptu_monthly_rate must be provided for active pricing. Cost processors will skip records with both rates NULL. Valid range: 0 to 1000000.

name: ptu_monthly_rate
description: Monthly rate per PTU/unit in USD. Issue #3: BUSINESS RULE - At least one of ptu_hourly_rate or ptu_monthly_rate must be provided for active pricing. Cost processors will skip records with both rates NULL. Valid range: 0 to 1000000.

name: min_units
description: Minimum units required. Issue #46: Standardized from min_ptu for consistency with API.

name: max_units
description: Maximum units available. Issue #46: Standardized from max_ptu for consistency with API.

name: commitment_term_months
description: Commitment term in months.

name: tokens_per_unit_minute
description: Tokens per unit per minute throughput. Issue #46: Standardized from tokens_per_ptu_minute.

name: term_discount_pct
description: Discount for longer commitment terms.

name: volume_discount_pct
description: Discount for higher unit volumes.

name: effective_from
description: Pricing effective start date.

name: effective_to
description: Pricing effective end date.

name: status
description: Status: active, deprecated.

name: is_override
description: True if org has custom pricing.

name: override_hourly_rate
description: Org-specific hourly rate override. Issue #45: Standardized override naming.

name: override_monthly_rate
description: Org-specific monthly rate override. Issue #45: Added for consistency with PAYG override pattern.

name: override_effective_from
description: When override pricing became effective. Issue #45: Added for consistency with PAYG.

name: override_notes
description: Notes for pricing override (contract reference).

name: last_updated
description: Timestamp of last update.

name: x_ingestion_date
description: Date when data was ingested - PARTITION KEY.

name: x_pipeline_id
description: Pipeline that loaded this pricing data.

name: x_credential_id
description: N/A for pricing reference data.

name: x_pipeline_run_date
description: Date when pricing was loaded.

name: x_run_id
description: Pipeline execution UUID.

name: x_ingested_at
description: When pricing was written to table.
